pullRequest.title: [F] Ported OwnerContentResource to spec-first (ENT-1878)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changed the method name listContent to listOwnerContent and getContent to getOwnerContent
Changed the OwnerContentResourceTest file to test the right methods as above
Made changes in candlepin-api-spec for OwnerContentResource

commit.message:
Ported OwnerContentResource to spec-first

- Changed the method name listContent to listOwnerContent and getContent to getOwnerContent
- Changed the OwnerContentResourceTest file to test the right methods as above
- Made changes in candlepin-api-spec for OwnerContentResource

nodes.bodyText: There is a couple of dependencies which are no longer used. We should remove them.

Unfortunately our resources do not trigger validation of incoming DTOs. We should inject DTOValidator and validate the DTOs. Take a look on DistributorVersionResource for example to see how it's used.

commit.message:
Added Validations to ContentDTO

- Added Vvalidations to ContentDTO in createContent method

Added ContentDTO validations

Added validations in updateContent and createBatchContent
